message.body: Hi -- I will be at ZAKTi and then I have to get started on job applications so I figured I could just come by and work at last drop/find out about New York. See you later -- unless of course you're not there so let me know
Sounds great. I am here but I slept maybe three hours last night. We didn't return until 2am and I begin work at 6am so I might be unable to be very productive or helpful.

My plan is to go home and sleep and then send that email to Jane and then do some rough draft emails for gallery proposals aka a standard email we would send to galleries letting them know about our services
But I can try to tell you about New York. Rita finished her MFA at Rutgers, which has a great painting program, and I met their director

That was pretty nice. But Sofie was a dumb dumb and blurted the news of my pregnancy the second we walked in so of course no one cared about my career or business or even asked about what I was doing- they just wanted to talk babies

Oh no!!! Ughh that is so frustrating. And don't worry -- I was coming by because I genuinely liked the chai latte you made me a lot and so I might as well just do work there too. I didn't mean that I needed help on applications haha! So if you're unhelpful...that is exactly what I expected. The painting director sounds cool though, I'm glad you had at least one success of the night
